text: Kenneth Alexander Mitchell (25 November 1974 â€“ 24 February 2024) was a Canadian actor. He was born in Toronto. His career began in 2000. He is known for playing many Klingon characters Star Trek: Discovery. He also played Deke Slayton in ABC's The Astronaut Wives Club television drama series. In 2006, Mitchell married actress Susan May Pratt. They had two children. In February 2020, Mitchell revealed that he was diagnosed with ALS in 2019.Star Trek: Discovery's Kenneth Mitchell Reveals ALS Diagnosis: 'I Can't Hide It Anymore' Mitchell died on February 24, 2024, at the age of 49. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1974 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Canadian movie actors Category:Canadian television actors Category:Canadian stage actors Category:Canadian voice actors Category:Actors from Toronto
title: Kenneth Mitchell (actor)
